Articles.Content: Hi, my name is Captain Tony and I am new to the forums.  I want to get this for my birthday. I tried looking on Wii store. I couldn't find it. I looked on Amazon. Where would I purchase the Wii U version?

Currently you can not.
SQUAD is working on console versions but no definitive details about a release date or features have been given.

@Tex_NL is correct. Currently the only versions of the game are for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Versions for consoles will be released eventually. (As in, we basically have no idea besides "sometime before the Earth is incinerated due to expansion of the sun.") Do you have a computer? KSP is not a very demanding game, especially on low settings. Most computers more advanced than a Chromebook can probably run it, if badly.
